ProductInfo.Features:

<7> Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter + <8> ML-L3 Shutter Remote Control + <9> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit +
<10> PD Spudz Microfiber Cloth + <11> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <12> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
